name: repetitively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves doing or saying the same thing several times, especially in a way that is boring: She pressed the button repetitively with one finger. They tried to train the child, patiently and repetitively, to share toys. They discuss the same events over and over, so repetitiously that it is almost unbearable.
More examplesFewer examplesThis is one of the most repetitively boring jobs you could ever do.At first, you just learn the movements of the dance repetitively.The story rambled on a little repetitively.
